meanings.definition: Used to express encouragement or approval to a female.
meanings.sent1: Attagirl! You did a great job on your presentation.
meanings.sent2: When she finished the race, everyone cheered and said, 'Attagirl!'
meanings.sent3: After she aced her test, her friends shouted, 'Attagirl!'
meanings.sent4: Her coach patted her on the back and said, 'Attagirl, keep up the good work.'
meanings.sent5: The teacher smiled and said, 'Attagirl, you're really improving.'

meanings.definition: A phrase used to show support or praise for a woman's actions.
meanings.sent1: She deserved an 'attagirl' for her hard work on the project.
meanings.sent2: The team gave her an 'attagirl' for scoring the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: Her 'attagirl' made her feel appreciated and motivated.
meanings.sent4: Receiving an 'attagirl' from her boss boosted her confidence.
meanings.sent5: The 'attagirl' from her colleagues made her day brighter.
